title: Knowledge Builder
description:
Orchestrate datasets and services to build your own knowledge workflow.
 Created knowledge can be used later to build further workflows or to inject in your own Data Apps, or Data Apps provided by OKP4 or third-party.

datasets.description: Select the datasets you want to use

service.description: Choose the service you want to apply

metaData.title: Enter the new dataset meta data

message.success: All the governance rules of Rhizome are respected

workflowState.success: Your knowledge has been successfully created!
